pairs.a: **Yes** - Zenlytic maintains SOC2 Type II certification, audited annually by Prescient Assurance. Current report: November 2025. [Security Homepage, SOC2 Reports]

pairs.q: Does Zenlytic encrypt data at rest?
pairs.a: **Yes** - AES-256 encryption for data at rest, TLS 1.2+ for data in transit. [CC2.1.2 Data Classification Policy; SOC2 Type II Report]
**Yes** - Background checks are performed for all employees during onboarding. [CC1.1.3 Human Resources Security & Onboarding Policy]
**Yes** - All employees complete security awareness training at hire and annually. [CC1.1.3 Human Resources Security & Onboarding Policy; SOC2 Type II Report]

pairs.q: Does Zenlytic have an incident response plan?
pairs.a: **Yes** - Documented Incident Management policy covering detection, response, containment, and recovery. 24-hour breach notification. [CC2.3.3 Incident Management Policy]
**Yes** - Annual penetration testing by third-party firms. Quarterly vulnerability scanning. [Security Homepage; SOC2 Type II Report]
**No raw data storage** - Query federation architecture. Query results cached temporarily (<1 hour) for display only. Chat retention is customer-configurable. [Engineering Wiki, Architecture]

pairs.q: Does Zenlytic have a BYOD policy?
pairs.a: **Yes** - BYOD supported with containerization, AES-256 encryption, MFA, remote wipe, VPN. Managed via Kandji MDM. [Engineering Wiki, MDM Requirements]
**Yes** - MFA required for all employee access to production systems. Available for customer accounts. [CC6.3.1 Access Management; SOC2 Type II Report]

pairs.q: Has Zenlytic had any security breaches?
pairs.a: **No** - Zenlytic has not experienced any security breaches to date. [Security Homepage]
**AWS** - Primary: us-east-1, Backup: us-west-2. Docker on ECS, RDS databases, S3 storage. [Engineering Wiki, Architecture]
**Yes** - SAML 2.0 SSO with Microsoft Entra ID and Okta. [docs.zenlytic.com/authentication-and-security]
**Yes** - GDPR supported with Standard Contractual Clauses in DPA. Data subject access request support available. [CC-P2.1 Privacy Practices Policy; DPA]

pairs.q: Does Zenlytic's AI train on customer data?
pairs.a: **No** - ZoÃ« does not train on customer data. LLM APIs (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google) used with data retention disabled. [CC.AI.1 AI Acceptable Use Policy]

pairs.q: Does Zenlytic have a business continuity plan?
pairs.a: **Yes** - BCP covers disaster recovery, data backup (every 5 minutes, 30-day retention, geo-redundant), and service restoration. [Business Continuity Plan; CC7.2.2 Database Backup Policy]
